summary: An Ordinance amending Section One (1), of Ordinance No. 22353, entitled: "An Ordinance designating the officers and man of the Police Department of the City of Seattle, prescribing their powers and duties, fixing their salaries, and repealing Ordinances Nos. 17565, 17752, 17962, 18384, 18763, 19785, 19809, 20273, 20363, 21661 and Sections 1 and 2 of Ordinance No. 16227" approved November 9th, 1909.
